X Factor's head honcho Simon Cowell hit up the Pride of Britain Awards last night, looking dapper as ever in his classic suit jacket and low cut shirt combo.

The music mogul, 60, looked as though he'd shed even more pounds after his recent impressive 20 lbs weight loss.

Backstage at the event, held at London's Grosvenor House Hotel, Simon showed off his frame that looked even leaner than usual.

Posing for a photo alongside fellow X Factor judge Louis Walsh, host Dermot O'Leary and Child of Courage Award winner Jaydee-Lee Dummett, Simon cheeks seemed skinnier and his jaw line more pronounced.

(Image: PA)

(Image: PA)

Simon made waves earlier this year when he strutted his stuff on the red carpet earlier this year.

Fans were quick to notice how great the dad of one looked with a more chiselled torso and thinner face.

He's not been shy about how he did it, crediting a vegan diet and cutting out sugar. He also laughed off all the rumours about how he got in shape.

Simon said: ""People have said, 'Oh, he's had a gastric fitted' - but I haven't.

(Image: PA)

"If I had, I would admit to it. This diet is all about what you put into your body. It's not the Atkins diet or anything else. It's just common sense."

Chatting to Best magazine, he revealed how it was a simple case of cutting out certain things and eating more veggies.

"It's not hard at all," he claimed, "I met this doctor in LA and he told me my diet was appalling and I had to cut out fatty foods and certain drinks.

"Within a few weeks, I could see the difference. Cutting out sugar made a massive difference.

"The first few weeks were difficult, but then I stopped craving sugar. I have also found a brilliant gluten-free beer, which helps.

"The hardest part is when I see Eric [his son] eat a pizza in front of me."

After a health scare back in 2017, Simon knew it was time for a change - he fell down the stairs in the middle of the night.

He also loved to snack on the jam tarts his personal chef would make.

The Daily Mirror Pride of Britain Awards, in partnership with TSB, broadcast on ITV on 5th November at 8pm.
description: Simon's already lost 20lbs with a dedicated vegan diet after a health scare forced him to confront his love of junk food
